what.title: What is PressFast for?
what.description: PressFast is an AI-native, high-performance boilerplate providing production-ready components to instantly launch your global commerce projects.

items.title: SaaS Product Website
items.description: Deliver professional SaaS websites and feature pages. Use Vibe-coding for rapid customization. Integrated Fumadocs ensures clear documentation, providing immediate user authentication and communication capability.

items.title: B2B Global Trade Inquiry Site
items.description: Establish B2B inquiry and lead generation platforms. Built-in SEO-friendly CMS and Crisp real-time chat. Efficiently customize the inquiry flow to help global trade businesses acquire high-quality leads immediately.

items.title: B2C E-commerce Site
items.description: Launch and monetize an independent B2C e-commerce site. Integrated Stripe for payment. Use the CMS for product listing to ensure instant transactions. Built on a high-performance stack for global speed, enabling PressFast, Cash Fast.

features.title: Key Features of PressFast
features.description: Everything you need to launch your AI SaaS startup quickly and efficiently.

items.title: AI-Native Architecture
items.description: Pre-integrated AI-SDK and Replicate interfaces, allowing custom features to easily call cutting-edge AI models.

items.title: High-Performance Stack
items.description: Production-ready stack based on Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Includes shadcn/ui for UI, managed by Prisma/Drizzle. Integrated Fumadocs supports rapid MDX documentation authoring.

items.title: Auth & Communication
items.description: Integrated better-auth for streamlined authentication and Crisp for real-time user chat.

items.title: Global Payment & Commerce
items.description: Supports Stripe (Alipay, WeChat Pay included) for global transactions.

items.title: Analytics & Data
items.description: Integrated analytics tools (DataFast, OpenPanel, Plausible) for data collection and user behavior analysis to drive growth.

items.title: Instant Deployment & CDN
items.description: Supports Cloudflare / Vercel instant deployment. Leverages Cloudflare R2 for file storage and global CDN, ensuring rapid delivery.

faq.title: faq
faq.description: Get everything you need to launch your AI startup - from ready-to-use templates to technical support.

questions.question: What exactly is PressFast and how does it work?
questions.answer: PressFast is an AI-native, high-performance boilerplate designed to rapidly launch B2B, B2C, and SaaS projects. It provides production-grade code and pre-integrated components, allowing you to measure the time from purchase to monetization in days.

questions.question: What is the key difference between PressFast and WordPress?
questions.answer: PressFast is the modern alternative to WordPress bloat. It is based on a high-performance stack like Next.js, eliminating unnecessary bulk and vendor lock-in, and providing extreme speed, full code control, and an AI-Native development experience.

questions.question: Do I need advanced technical skills to use PressFast?
questions.answer: Basic programming knowledge (like React/Next.js) is helpful. However, PressFast's clear code structure, complete documentation, and support for Vibe-coding make customization highly efficient, even if you are not an expert in AI or cloud architecture.

questions.question: Can I customize the templates to match my brand?
questions.answer: Absolutely! PressFast templates are fully customizable. You can use Vibe-coding to easily modify the design, features, and business logic while retaining the robust underlying architecture. UI components are based on shadcn/ui, offering high flexibility.

questions.question: How long does it typically take to launch with PressFast?
questions.answer: Launch speed is PressFast's core value. You can complete setup in hours and use Vibe-coding to finish customization and deployment in days, achieving rapid monetization and significantly reducing the traditional months-long development cycle.

questions.question: What is Vibe-coding?
questions.answer: Vibe-coding is a development paradigm used with AI-coding editors, designed to leverage AI to boost the efficiency of secondary development and customization, making your code modification process feel intuitive and seamless.

questions.question: What core integrations are included in PressFast?
questions.answer: Key integrations include: better-auth (Authentication), Stripe (Payments), Crisp (Chat), CMS, Cloudflare/Vercel (Deployment), and datafa.st and other business analytics tools.

questions.question: How can I use the AI features?
questions.answer: PressFast encapsulates an AI-SDK toolkit based on the Replicate platform for calling powerful AI capabilities during your custom development. The toolkit supports text/image generation, image background removal, and other multimedia processing. Developers must apply for an API Token on the Replicate platform to begin use.

questions.question: What content models does the CMS provide?
questions.answer: The CMS essentially provides multiple content models: it supports structured models required for SEO-targeted BLOG publishing, product showcasing, and e-commerce transaction listings to meet various business needs.

questions.question: How do I enable the in-page chat feature?
questions.answer: The in-page chat feature is enabled via the Crisp integration. You need to register an account on the Crisp platform, obtain your Crisp Website ID, and configure it within the PressFast project's environment variables. The code will automatically render the chat widget.
